product_name: Soleus Stride Digital Sports Watch - Men's - 2013 Overstock
long_description: Loaded with run tracking features and a 24-hour chronograph, the water-resistant Stride also features a bright EL backlight to keep stats handy at any hour, so you can run whenever the mood strikes.
short_description: Loaded with run tracking features and a 24-hour chronograph, the water-resistant Stride also features a bright EL backlight to keep stats handy at any hour, so you can run whenever the mood strikes.
